player.title: Players
player.description: CRED helps athletes accelerate their savings and investments so that footballers can secure their post career financial future.

clubs.title: Clubs
clubs.description: CRED provides football clubs with unique financing and commercial opportunities in the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, Championship and Serie A.

about.title: About
about.description: CRED is an investment platform for sports and entertainment, providing investors with access to new asset classes.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: The CRED Blog is a place to learn more about finance in sports and to assist industry participants with key insights.
